title: DOWNLOAD PROBLEM
body: OK LISTEN RIOT I WANT TO DOWNLOAD LOL TO MY COMPUTER AND I HAVE A PROBLEM IT GOES AT 45% AND AFTER IT CLOSE AND I CANT DOWNLOAD THE GAME WHEN(applying patches)IT SAYS THA I HAVE TO UPDATE TO WINDOWS XP SERVICE PACK 3 AND I HAVE WINDOWS 10 WHATG SHOULD I DO GIVE ME LINKS TO DOWNLOAD SOMETHING USEFULL!OR TELL ME WHAT TO DO!{{summoner:14}} {{champion:45}}

replies.body:
That's a first! I've never heard of the service pack prompt, especially on windows 10. First, I recommend ensuring your Windows 10 updates are all installed, in case the prompt was just a placeholder for asking you to update Windows. Additionally, I'd check [ensure your local network settings are compatible with League](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), since issues at this point are typically a network disconnection from the patching servers.

If this issue persists, please screenshot the error prompt and upload it on a hosting site so you can link it here. Let me know if you have any questions.
